title: Radical Acceptance Exercises
introText: Take your time with these calming exercises to build emotional awareness and expand your ability to identify and name feelings with kindness toward yourself.

exercises.title: Acceptance Journal
exercises.description: Write about a situation that's hard to accept. List the facts without judgment, note emotions that arise. Practice writing a coping statement for each entry.

exercises.title: Daily Practice
exercises.description: Spend five minutes daily identifying something small you find challenging to accept (delay, mistake). Use Radical Acceptance to process it in real time.

exercises.title: Coping Statements List
exercises.description: Create personal list of affirmations like 'I cannot change the past, but I can choose my response.' Refer to it when emotions run high.

exercises.title: Acceptance Visualization
exercises.description: Imagine yourself letting go of resistance, like releasing a balloon into the sky. Reflect on how this feels emotionally and physically.

exercises.title: Be Patient With Yourself
exercises.description: The more you patiently practice identifying emotions, the better you'll become at understanding and managing them with compassion.
